SEARCH
Package kea.exercise.hogwartsstudentadmin.edu.hogwarts.controller

Class CourseController

java.lang.Object
kea.exercise.hogwartsstudentadmin.edu.hogwarts.controller.CourseController
@RestController public class CourseController extends Object
The CourseController class is a REST controller that handles HTTP requests for the Course model. It is responsible for handling requests for the Course model and returning responses to the client.

  • Method Details

    • getAllCourses

      @GetMapping("/courses") public List<CourseResponseDTO> getAllCourses()
      This method handles the HTTP GET request for the /courses endpoint. It returns a list of all courses in the database.
      Returns:
      A list of CourseResponseDTO objects.

    • getCourseById

      @GetMapping("/courses/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CourseResponseDTO> getCourseById(@PathVariable Long id)
      This method handles the HTTP GET request for the /courses/{id} endpoint. It returns a course with the specified id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course to return.
      Returns:
      A CourseResponseDTO object.

    • getTeacherByCourseId

      @GetMapping("/courses/{id}/teacher") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TeacherResponseDTO> getTeacherByCourseId(@PathVariable Long id)
      This method handles the HTTP GET request for the /courses/{id}/teacher endpoint. It returns the teacher of the course with the specified id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course to return the teacher for.
      Returns:
      A TeacherResponseDTO object.

    • getStudentsByCourseId

      @GetMapping("/courses/{id}/students") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<StudentResponseDTO>> getStudentsByCourseId(@PathVariable Long id)
      This method handles the HTTP GET request for the /courses/{id}/students endpoint. It returns a list of students enrolled in the course with the specified id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course to return the students for.
      Returns:
      A list of StudentResponseDTO objects.

    • createCourse

      @PostMapping("/courses") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CourseResponseDTO> createCourse(@RequestBody CourseRequestDTO courseData)
      This method handles the HTTP POST request for the /courses endpoint. It creates a new course with the specified data.
      Parameters:
      courseData - The data for the new course.
      Returns:
      A CourseResponseDTO object.

    • addTeacherToCourse

      @PostMapping("/courses/{id}/teacher") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CourseResponseDTO> addTeacherToCourse(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody TeacherRequestDTO teacher)
      This method handles the HTTP POST request for the /courses/{id}/teacher endpoint. It adds a teacher to the course with the specified id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course to add the teacher to.
      teacher - The data for the teacher to add to the course.
      Returns:
      A CourseResponseDTO object.

    • addStudentsToCourse

      @PostMapping("/courses/{id}/students") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CourseResponseDTO> addStudentsToCourse(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody List<StudentRequestDTO> students)
      This method handles the HTTP POST request for the /courses/{id}/students endpoint. It adds students to the course with the specified id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course to add the students to.
      students - The data for the students to add to the course.
      Returns:
      A CourseResponseDTO object.

    • updateCourse

      @PutMapping("/courses/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CourseResponseDTO> updateCourse(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody CourseRequestDTO courseData)
      This method handles the HTTP PUT request for the /courses/{id} endpoint. It updates the course with the specified id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course to update.
      courseData - The new data for the course.
      Returns:
      A CourseResponseDTO object.

    • updateCoursePartially

      @PatchMapping("/courses/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CourseResponseDTO> updateCoursePartially(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody CourseRequestDTO courseData)
      This method handles the HTTP PATCH request for the /courses/{id} endpoint. It partially updates the course with the specified id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course to update.
      courseData - The new data for the course.
      Returns:
      A CourseResponseDTO object.

    • deleteCourse

      @DeleteMapping("/courses/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CourseResponseDTO> deleteCourse(@PathVariable Long id)
      This method handles the HTTP DELETE request for the /courses/{id} endpoint. It deletes the course with the specified id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course to delete.
      Returns:
      A CourseResponseDTO object.

    • deleteStudentFromCourse

      @DeleteMapping("/courses/{id}/student/{studentId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<StudentResponseDTO> deleteStudentFromCourse(@PathVariable Long id, @PathVariable Long studentId)
      This method handles the HTTP DELETE request for the /courses/{id}/teacher endpoint. It removes the teacher from the course with the specified id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course to remove the teacher from.
      studentId - The id of the teacher to remove from the course.
      Returns:
      A CourseResponseDTO object.
